channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: 2021年5月のトリビューン・パブリッシング買収の一環としてボルチモア・サン・メディアを買収したオールデン社から、シンクレア社のデビッド・スミス執行会長が買収（Lorraine Mirabella/Baltimore Sun）
item.description:
Lorraine Mirabella / Baltimore Sun:
David Smith, executive chairman of Sinclair, acquires Baltimore Sun Media from Alden, which had bought it as part of its May 2021 Tribune Publishing acquisition  —  The Baltimore Sun, the largest newspaper in Maryland, has been acquired in a private deal by David D. Smith …

item.title: OpenAIが2024年の選挙に向けた計画を発表、画像証明ツール、なりすましや政治的キャンペーンのためのツールをユーザーに作らせない、など（OpenAI）
item.description:
OpenAI:
OpenAI shares its plans ahead of 2024 elections, including image provenance tools, not letting users make tools for impersonation or political campaigning, more  —  We're working to prevent abuse, provide transparency on AI-generated content, and improve access to accurate voting information.

item.title: アフリカ50カ国で展開するショーマックスがリニューアル、アンドレア・ザッピアを会長に任命、コムキャストと提携、5年で10億ドルの収益を目指す（Loni Prinsloo/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Loni Prinsloo / Bloomberg:
Showmax, available in 50 African countries, relaunches, appoints Andrea Zappia as chair, and partners with Comcast, aiming to generate $1B revenue in five years  —  - Showmax re-launched its service on Monday to grow audiences  — Service is targeting $1 billion in revenues in five years

item.title: 型破りで異例のアイオワ州共和党予備選の取材、2016年との違い、メディア不信などについて、キャスターやネットワーク特派員が語る（Ted Johnson/Deadline）
item.description:
Ted Johnson / Deadline:
Anchors and network correspondents talk about covering the unconventional and an unusual Iowa GOP primary, the differences from 2016, media mistrust, and more  —  The Iowa caucus on Monday will be like no other —  and that was apparent from the start, well before subzero weather raised doubts …

item.title: ストリーミングのおかげで音楽業界は9年間成長してきたにもかかわらず、スポティファイやUMGのような企業は給与を引き締めたり、従業員を解雇したりしている（Lucas Shaw/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Lucas Shaw / Bloomberg:
Despite nine years of music industry growth thanks to streaming, companies like Spotify and UMG are tightening payouts or laying off employees  —  After years of a streaming boom, record labels are searching for their next big win.  —  Last year was brutal for the media business …

item.title: アイリッシュ・サン紙、キーラン・マクデイドの後任としてフィオナ・ウィン副編集長を編集長に任命、これでサン紙の全国3版すべてが女性編集長となる（Bron Maher/Press Gazette）
item.description:
Bron Maher / Press Gazette:
The Irish Sun appoints Deputy Editor Fiona Wynne as editor, replacing Kieran McDaid, meaning all three national editions of The Sun are now led by women  —  The appointment means each national edition of The Sun is edited by a woman.  —  Irish Sun deputy editor Fiona Wynne will replace Kieran McDaid …

item.title: 大量出版戦略への依存など、メッセンジャー紙がスタッフを解雇し、経営難に陥っている問題（Laura Wagner/Washington Post）
item.description:
Laura Wagner / Washington Post:
A look at issues at The Messenger, including its reliance on a high-volume publishing strategy, as the outlet lays off staff and struggles to stay afloat  —  Jimmy Finkelstein had big dreams and a $50 million investment.  Eight months after the Messenger's launch, it is laying off staff and struggling to stay afloat.

item.title: Mirror』誌のアリソン・フィリップス編集長は4年近く務めた後、1月末で退任する予定で、後任には『Reach Magazines』誌のキャロライン・ウォーターストンEICが就任する（Charlotte Tobitt/Press Gazette）。
item.description:
Charlotte Tobitt / Press Gazette:
Mirror Editor-in-Chief Alison Phillips plans to step down at the end of January after almost four years, succeeded by Reach Magazines EIC Caroline Waterston  —  Mirror editor-in-chief Alison Phillips will step down at the end of January after almost six years leading the brand.

item.title: 2017年にスタートし、幅広いテーマを扱い、リスナーが全額出資する週刊Blindboy Podcastのホスト兼クリエイターであるBlindboyのプロフィール（Daniel Dylan Wray/The Guardian）
item.description:
Daniel Dylan Wray / The Guardian:
A profile of Blindboy, host and creator of the weekly Blindboy Podcast, which launched in 2017, covers a wide-range of subjects, and is fully listener-funded  —  He wears plastic bags as an ‘autistic protest’ and makes podcasts about everything from fish fingers to the Baileys sex cult.

item.title: ルミネイト世界の上位10K曲に占めるヒンディー語の割合は、2022年の6.1%から2023年には7.8%に増加、英語は62.1%から54.9%、スペイン語は11.8%から10.1%に減少（Ananya Bhattacharya/Quartz）
item.description:
Ananya Bhattacharya / Quartz:
Luminate: Hindi songs' share of the top 10K global tracks grew from 6.1% in 2022 to 7.8% in 2023; English fell from 62.1% to 54.9%, Spanish from 11.8% to 10.1%  —  Bollywood music and indie musicians — hip-hop artists especially — are fueling the Hindi music streaming phenomena

item.title: ニールセン：Peacock が独占配信したNFL AFCワイルドカードゲームは、米国史上最もストリーミングされたイベントとなり、総視聴者数は27.6M、ピーク平均視聴者数は24.6Mだった（Richard Lawler/The Verge）。
item.description:
Richard Lawler / The Verge:
Nielsen: Peacock's exclusive stream of the NFL AFC Wild Card game was the most-streamed event in US history, with 27.6M total viewers and a 24.6M peak average  —  The streams we were watching mostly held up, if you saw the game, how was the experience for you?

item.title: アップルは2023年9月、Podcastsアプリが自動的にエピソードをダウンロードする方法を変更し、いくつかの大手ポッドキャストのダウンロード数を劇的に減少させた（Max Tani/Semafor）
item.description:
Max Tani / Semafor:
Apple's September 2023 change to how its Podcasts app automatically downloads episodes dramatically cut the download numbers for some of the biggest podcasts  —  The News  —  Apple has quietly tightened its reporting of how many people listen to podcasts, sending shock waves through …

item.title: メモBIのバーバラ・ペン最高経営責任者（CEO）は、ネリ・オックスマンのMIT学位論文の盗用に関する報道は厳密かつ公正なものであったと内部調査で判明したと発表。
item.description:
Sam Jones / Financial Times:
Memo: BI CEO Barbara Peng says an internal review found reporting on plagiarism in Neri Oxman's MIT thesis to be rigorous and fair; Axel Springer stands by BI  —  Owner Axel Springer says it ‘stands by’ publication amid dispute with academic and her husband Bill Ackman

item.title: 英国を拠点とする音楽ビデオストリーミングサービスの米国での立ち上げ、ライセンス契約、収益、主な競合他社などについて、Roxiのロブ・ルイスCEOにQ&A（Georg Szalai/The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Georg Szalai / The Hollywood Reporter:
Q&A with Roxi CEO Rob Lewis on launching the UK-based music video streaming service in the US, licensing deals, generating revenue, key competitors, and more  —  “Building a global a global music video streaming service is way harder than building a Netflix or Disney+,” says Rob Lewis.

item.title: ワシントン・ポスト紙に40年近く寄稿し、鋭いウィットで知られたピューリッツァー賞受賞のテレビ批評家、トム・シェールズ氏が79歳で死去（ワシントン・ポスト紙）
item.description:
Washington Post:
Tom Shales, a Pulitzer Prize-winning TV critic who spent nearly 40 years writing for The Washington Post and was known for his incisive wit, dies at 79  —  He spent nearly 40 years writing for The Washington Post and was known for his incisive and barbed commentary
